New Records: The Oklahoma City Thunder are on a five-game win streak heading into the game.
Pre-Game Insights: The Thunder rank seventh in the Western Conference with 33.8 defensive rebounds per game led by Isaiah Hartenstein averaging 9.9.
The Grizzlies rank sixth in the NBA with 12.7 offensive rebounds per game led by Zach Edey averaging 3.7.
The Thunder make 46.4% of their shots from the field, while the Grizzlies allow 43.9% to their opponents.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander is averaging 30.8 points, 5.6 rebounds, 6.1 assists, and two steals for the Thunder.
Santi Aldama is averaging 13 points and 7.3 rebounds for the Grizzlies.
Others: The Thunder are 16-5 in conference play, and the Grizzlies are 9-7 in Western Conference play.
Key players to watch include Shai Gilgeous-Alexander and Santi Aldama.
